summary: This is an email from a contractor to an individual referred to as 'M' regarding the completion of creating new PDF files from 66 original PDF files provided in June 2019. The contractor has the data on a flash drive and offers to bring it for review before it is loaded into the Relativity e-discovery platform.

events.title: Handover of 66 PDF files
events.description: An individual referred to as 'M' provided 66 PDF files to a contractor.

events.title: Completion of PDF file creation
events.description: A contractor informs 'M' that they have finished creating new PDF files from the 66 original files and have the data ready on a flash drive for review before loading to Relativity.

keyFacts: A contractor completed the task of creating new PDF files from 66 original PDF files provided in June 2019.
The data was prepared for loading into Relativity, an e-discovery and document review platform commonly used in legal investigations.
The email indicates an ongoing process of document processing and review related to the Epstein case in August 2019.
